page.title: 11Fairoak Valley Cannock Chase
page.content: Lots of people use{Cannock Chase} for walks and picnics. You may see {deer} and other wildlife there. A very interesting and beautiful walk takes you through coniferous woodlands down {Fairoak Valley.} The track goes near to an old{disused mine} all overgrown with trees. In the valley are two pools called {Fairoak pools.}They are used for private trout fishing. The firemen also use them for water if there is a forest fire. Several waterbirds can be seen there. Lower down the valley are two other pools called{Stonybrook pools.}They were used by the old Fairoak Colliery about 100 years ago. A few remains of the colliery can be seen amongst the trees.
